song_name: Super Smash Bros Melee - Icicle Mountain
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Super Smash Bros Melee - Icicle Mountain is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Super Smash Bros Melee - Icicle Mountain has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Mixolydian,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
